title: Email fails to be processed due to invalid security token
content:
The user receives the following email notification:

We could not process your email. The email's security token may have been altered. Try to send it again by clicking the same action link/button.

To track or update the request, log in to the Service Portal.

Cause

Service Management failed to process an email action due to an invalid or altered token.

Solution

Make sure that the bottom part of the incoming email that contains the security token isn't changed.

Contact Support if the problem persists for multiple users.
